description.0: A sharp filleting knife. The blade is long, thin, and incredibly sharp.

0.0: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal <cryo>240%</cryo> ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every <cryo>15</cryo>s.

1.0: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal <cryo>280%</cryo> ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every <cryo>14</cryo>s.

2.0: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal <cryo>320%</cryo> ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every <cryo>13</cryo>s.

3.0: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal <cryo>360%</cryo> ATK DMG to a single opponent. Can only occur once every <cryo>12</cryo>s.

4.0: On hit, has a 50% chance to deal <cryo>400%</cryo> ATK DMG to a single target. Can only occur once every <cryo>11</cryo>s.
